code: import{createAsyncThunk,createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import axios from"axios";import{BASE_URL}from"../../utils/constants";export const getCategories=createAsyncThunk("categories/getCategories",async(_,thunkAPI)=>{try{const res=await axios("".concat(BASE_URL,"/categories"));return res.data;}catch(err){console.log(err);return thunkAPI.rejectWithValue(err);}});const categoriesSlice=createSlice({name:"categories",initialState:{list:[],isLoading:false},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addCase(getCategories.pending,state=>{state.isLoading=true;});builder.addCase(getCategories.fulfilled,(state,_ref)=>{let{payload}=_ref;state.list=payload;state.isLoading=false;});builder.addCase(getCategories.rejected,state=>{state.isLoading=false;});}});export default categoriesSlice.reducer;
